description: Chisel
name: CHISEL

description: Hardened alloy steel jaws are designed and manufactured to ensure the longest possible blade life.
name: Cut Bolt

description: Hardened alloy steel jaws are designed and manufactured to ensure the longest possible blade life.
name: Spare Short Bolts

description: Amber screwdrivers with round bar torx tip, strictly calibrated that allow a better assembly with the screw combined with the strength of the microalloy steel.
name: SCREWDRIVER TORX PUNTA T-10

description: Valve screwdriver, ideal for installing and removing standard valve cores. It has a slotted tip that fits all standard valves and operates like a screwdriver.
name: VALVE SOUL SCREWDRIVER

description: Screwdriver set ECX tip? top fit in special screws, cable stripper for cables up to 12 gauge, hole for bending cables up to 12 gauge points marked on the upper part of the handle - quick identification
name: 8 PCS DISARMERS SET

description: Small scissor ladder ideal for home, has double steel reinforcement under the lower step to give extra support. Heels with one-piece non-slip surface and with a wide tread.
name: STAIR LADDER

description: Simple scissor ladder for industrial use with double steel reinforcement under the lower step to give extra support. It has a lid with very strong and durable tool grooves that allows to keep them at hand
name: LADDER SCISSOR FIBER GLASS

description: Rigid spatula with wooden handle and blade with mirror polish. Its leaves are assembled along the handle, riveted for better fixation. 1065 high carbon steel blade, with a hardness of 48 degrees Rc.
name: RIGID SPATULA WOOD HANDLE

description: Ideal mechanical ball hammer for industrial and automotive work. Manufactured with double heat treatment.
name: BALL HAMMER

description: Marro de bronec de 29 oz. con mango de madera, gracias a su cabeza de bronce evita la deformación de los materiales así como evita la chispa al impacto. El mango es de estructura compacta que ofrece gran resistencia
name: MARTILLO DE BRONCE No. 2

description: Martillo ideal para albañilería y obra negra, para trabajo pesado en construcción y oficios similares. Este martillo indestructible de uña recta, esta forjado en una sola pieza.
name: MARTILLO CABEZA RECTA

description: Mini clamps for electricians of the FOY line, added by spring for easy use. They are forged in high carbon steel with double plastisol handle. They are ideal for electronics work
name: MINI CLAMPS DIAGONAL CUT

description: Pinzeta of curved precision for areas of difficult access in chromed steel, very useful in works that demand a lot of precision and control.
name: XCELITE PINZETA

description: Carpenter tongs made of carbon steel with a hardness of 45 Rc in the body and 50 Rc in the edges. It has cutting zones tempered by induction
name: THREADS FOR CARPENTER

description: Pressure Clamp
name: PRESSURE CLAMP

description: Set of 3 adjustable keys in chrome finish and presented in a practical vinyl case. Keys of different dimensions: 25.4mm, 28.5mm and 33.3mm
name: URREA ADJUSTABLE KEYS SET

description: The obstruction keys allow to operate or torque a nut or screw in those places where a key without angle, it is impossible to freely access and completely cover its walls, resulting in greater safety and accuracy in its performance.
name: KEY OBSTRUCTION

description: Straight pipe wrenches that feature a cast iron receptacle and I-beam handle, with a full floating forged hook clamp, with threads that clean themselves.
name: RIDGID KEY FOR PIPE

description: Adjustable stilts with double security system. 105 kg / 230 lb. capacity aluminum body. It has grip straps for safety, as well as a sponge clamp in the calf area for comfort. Adjustable support to reach the desired height.
name: STILTS WITH ELEVATION
